Title: Requires that recipients of public assistance benefits must be residents of the state for at least ninety days prior to applying for such benefits
Summary: Requires that recipients of public assistance benefits must be residents of the state for at least ninety days prior to applying for such benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง131, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring that recipients of public assistance benefits must be residents of the state for at least ninety days prior to applying for such benefits
